item.title: [Resolved] Known Issue: Deluge 2.0.4
item.description: Version 2.0.5 has been released to resolve this issue. An upstream issue with deluge-web in version 2.0.4 has broken the deluge webui for users. Please roll back to the version-2.0.3-2201906121747ubuntu18.04.1 tag until a fix is published.
item.content:
Version 2.0.5 has been released to resolve this issue.

An upstream issue with deluge-web in version 2.0.4 has broken the deluge webui for users. Please roll back to the version-2.0.3-2201906121747ubuntu18.04.1 tag until a fix is published.

item.title: New Container: Deluge
item.content:
We have released a new container for Deluge!

Deluge is a lightweight, Free Software, cross-platform BitTorrent client.

  • Full Encryption
  • WebUI
  • Plugin System
  • Much more…
